metadata.name: Squared earth
metadata.description:
In a turbulent terrain, people gaze at the vastness of space beyond and appear to be lost in thoughts, contemplating the mysteries of the universe. Glancing towards a large skull, hinting the darker themes underlying the piece. 

Worlds of text and symbolism, hidden away in the cracks and crevices of the work, creating a layered and immersive experience.  

The artwork is a testament to the human desire to explore and discover, no matter the cost. Itâ€™s is a celebration of the human spirit, a tribute to our never-ending quest for knowledge, wisdom and adventure.

Created for "Monochrome visions" curated by @futuradrops

4500x8000px jpg  
Drawing, ai, photoshop;
